song_lyrics: Kaho kyāre maḷsho Nāth, jhālo hāth,
Yogī Bāpā, mane lāgī tamarī mayā...
Prabhu have bujhāvo tāp taṇī ā jvāḷā... mane 1
Jāvu moḍu vahelu chhoḍī jagatnī mayā... mane 2
muj shir par hāth ja dhārone,
Kaho kyāre dhīraj desho Gonḍalvāḷā... mane 3
eto āsh ja urmā dhāre chhe,
Kaho kyāre darshan desho mujne pyārā... mane 4
title: Kaho kyāre maḷsho Nāth jhālo hāth

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-977: unknown

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
